# Requirements Quality Checklist: Receive Registration Payment Confirmation Ticket

**Purpose**: Validate completeness, clarity, and consistency of UC-20 requirements for QA review
**Created**: 2026-02-06

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 Are all three user stories reflected in functional requirements? [Completeness, Spec §User Stories, Spec §FR-001..FR-009]
- [ ] CHK002 Are requirements defined for ticket generation and storage? [Completeness, Spec §FR-001..FR-002]
- [ ] CHK003 Are requirements defined for delivery channels? [Completeness, Spec §FR-003, Spec §FR-007]
- [ ] CHK004 Are requirements defined for delivery failure logging and attendee messaging? [Completeness, Spec §FR-004..FR-005, Spec §FR-008]
- [ ] CHK005 Are requirements defined for ticket access before delivery? [Completeness, Spec §FR-006, Spec §FR-009]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK006 Is the delivery channel requirement explicit (email + in-system)? [Clarity, Spec §FR-007]
- [ ] CHK007 Is the delivery failure message content explicitly defined? [Clarity, Spec §FR-008]
- [ ] CHK008 Is pre-delivery access defined as both view and download? [Clarity, Spec §FR-009]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK009 Do edge cases align with functional requirements without contradictions? [Consistency, Spec §Edge Cases, Spec §FR-004..FR-009]
- [ ] CHK010 Do assumptions align with payment confirmation and delivery requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Assumptions, Spec §FR-001..FR-003]
- [ ] CHK011 Are acceptance scenarios consistent with delivery failure handling and access rules? [Consistency, Spec §Acceptance Scenarios, Spec §FR-004..FR-009]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK012 Are success criteria measurable and verifiable? [Acceptance Criteria, Spec §SC-001..SC-003]
- [ ] CHK013 Do success criteria map to requirements (generate, deliver, access)? [Traceability, Spec §SC-001..SC-003, Spec §FR-001..FR-009]
- [ ] CHK014 Are success criteria free of implementation details? [Clarity, Spec §SC-001..SC-003]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK015 Are primary delivery flows fully covered by requirements and scenarios? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 1, Spec §FR-001..FR-003]
- [ ] CHK016 Are delivery failure flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 2, Spec §FR-004..FR-008]
- [ ] CHK017 Are pre-delivery access flows covered in scenarios and requirements? [Coverage, Spec §User Story 3, Spec §FR-006..FR-009]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK018 Are edge cases written as explicit requirements or measurable outcomes, not just questions? [Gap, Spec §Edge Cases]

## Non-Functional Requirements

- [ ] CHK019 Are response-time expectations specified for ticket generation/delivery? [Gap, Spec §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK020 Are security/privacy requirements for ticket access specified or intentionally out of scope? [Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK021 Are dependencies on payment confirmation documented? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK022 Are assumptions about attendee contact validity documented? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
